entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
